entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
